title: POZ: Frailty and falls have a high cost for people with HIV
desc: Falls could lead to more than 180,000 lost life-years and over $3 billion in lifetime costs, while the cost of frailty could approach $9 billion.

title: Atiku and Fayose Clash Over Makinde's 2027 Political Deal
desc: Atiku Abubakar dismisses Ayodele Fayose's claims of a 2027 political deal with Gov. Makinde after their Minna meeting, calling the allegations baseless.

desc: New scientific research suggests that fecal matter — human poop — could be the newest way to fight cancer.

title: Canada's Courtney Sarault skates to Olympic short track bronze in women's 500 metres

title: Wet weather may force use of outfall pipe near Wellington beaches
